[[Image:John Ogwen Tylluan Wen.JPG|thumb|''John Ogwen''- Ifor Preis]]
 
'''''Tylluan Wen''''' is a [[Welsh language]] [[film]] / [[television]] drama produced in [[Wales]] in 1997 by Ffilmiau'r Nant. It is set in [[Llan Ffestiniog]], [[Gwynedd]], as an adaptation of Angharad Jones's novel ''Y Dylluan Wen'' (''The White Owl''). The film is studied as part of the Welsh literature [[GCSE]] course.
'''''Tylluan Wen''''' is a [[Welsh language]] [[film]] / [[television]] drama produced in [[Wales]] in 1997 by Ffilmiau'r Nant. It is set in [[Llan Ffestiniog]], [[Gwynedd]], as an adaptation of Angharad Jones's novel ''Y Dylluan Wen'' (''The White Owl''). The film is studied as part of the Welsh literature [[GCSE]] course.
